message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.MA 

This paper is about reinforcement learning (RL) algorithms, specifically the option-critic learning framework. The paper proposes an extension to the hierarchical option-critic policy gradient theorem for the average reward criterion. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), which is the primary category for RL research. The paper also deals with optimization and control, which are covered by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.RO (Robotics). The paper's use of Markov chains and ordinary differential equations suggests that it could also be classified under cs.SY (Systems and Control) and cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems).
